BriefDescription: Counts cycles with an address-generation interlock
Counts cycles with a long-latency interlock
Counts cycles with a CSR interlock
Counts cycles in which the instruction cache was not able to provide an instruction
Counts cycles in which the data cache blocked an instruction
Counts mispredictions of conditional branch direction (taken/not taken)
Counts mispredictions of the target PC of control-flow instructions
Counts flushes of the core pipeline. Common causes include fence.i and CSR accesses
Counts cycles with a multiply or divide interlock
Counts cycles with a floating-point interlock
